Class Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter

Represents a System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator and SyndicationResourceLoadSettings that are used to fill a ApmlDocument.

Namespace: Argotic.Data.Adapters
Assembly: Argotic.Core.dll
Syntax
public class Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter : SyndicationResourceAdapter
Remarks

The Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter serves as a bridge between a ApmlDocument and an XML data source. The Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter provides this bridge by mapping Fill(ApmlDocument), which changes the data in the ApmlDocument to match the data in the data source.

This syndication resource adapter is designed to fill ApmlDocument objects using a System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator that represents XML data that conforms to the APML 0.6 specification.

Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter(XPathNavigator, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings)

Initializes a new instance of the Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter class using the supplied System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator and SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.

Declaration
public Apml06SyndicationResourceAdapter(XPathNavigator navigator, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator

A read-only System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator object for navigating through the syndication document information.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the load operation of the ApmlDocument.
Remarks

This class expects the supplied navigator to be positioned on the XML element that represents a ApmlDocument.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The navigator is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The settings is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
